tab1.text1:
Welcome to our server. We have a long record of running clusters and are excited to bring them to ASA.
We hope you enjoy the server and if you need anything don't hesitate to ask.
tab1.text2:
<TextStyle.Red>Discord & Nicknames</>
	Everyone must join the discord!
	Names and Tribe names must be consistent.
	NO “Anonymous” names. I.e. 123, Human, Bob.
<TextStyle.Red>No Excessive/Toxic Behavior & No Harassment</>
	No racism or sexually explicit content.
	No base wiping(where possible).
<TextStyle.Red>No Cheating/Exploiting</>
<TextStyle.Red>No Spamming Chat/Structures</>
